ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone Out There?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all~ Still around.  I tend to play my Cleric 60 as my main these days. Have also Rogue 60, Ench 60, Wiz 58.  I am enjoying the guild I am in - we are
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all~

Still around. I tend to play my Cleric 60 as my main
these days. Have also Rogue 60, Ench 60, Wiz 58. I am
enjoying the guild I am in - we are doing Tier 5 stuff
now (NToV, Tunare, IV, etc.)

One spot I found where bards can show off is Fungus
Grove. I partner up with a shaman and play my Area
Effect DoT's with my Maestro Lute (Chords, Cessation &
Bereavement). With slowed mobs, not a lot of healing
is required. If I can find a shaman, I use my cleric
and my ench.

Good luck and good hunting,

Sylly Songsynger
Virtuoso
Somewhere on Innoruuk...


--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
wrote:

> Tani is 59 now, after not playing her for almost 9
> months I've found the
> time to do so again a bit. Its hard remembering
> what all the songs do on
> top of trying to figure out those new icons!
>
> Anyway, hi to anyone still hanging around :)
>
>
> Tani/Halana
